languages.text: "Презрев запреты Омниссии, еретик вступил на опасное поле экспериментов с варп-технологиями. Это опасные знания... Но древнее и невероятно сложное вокс-ядро механизма гораздо старше, чем Дельфим. Вероятно, он нашел его здесь и приспособил под свои нужды".

"Defying the dictums of the Omnissiah, the heretic had entered into a dangerous field of experimentation with the warp-technology. It is dangerous knowledge... but the ancient and incredibly complex vox-core of the mechanism is much older than Delphim was. He had probably found it here and made use of it to fulfil his needs."
languages.original_text: "Презрев запреты Омниссии, еретик вступил на опасное поле экспериментов с варп-технологиями. Это опасные знания... Но древнее и невероятно сложное вокс-ядро механизма гораздо старше, чем Дельфим. Вероятно, он нашел его здесь и приспособил под свои нужды".

traits.locale_text: ""Defying the ban of the Omnissiah, the heretic had entered a dangerous field of experimentation with the warp-technology. It is a dangerous knowledge... But the ancient and incredibly complex vox-core of the mechanism is much older than Delphim is. He had probably found it here and made use of it to fulfil its needs."

""Defying the ban of the Omnissiah, the heretic had entered a dangerous field of experimentation with the warp-technology. It is a dangerous knowledge... But the ancient and incredibly complex vox-core of the mechanism is much older than Delphim is. He had probably found it here and made use of it to fulfil its needs."

"Defying the dictums of the Omnissiah, the heretic had entered into a dangerous field of experimentation with the warp-technology. It is dangerous knowledge... but the ancient and incredibly complex vox-core of the mechanism is much older than Delphim is. He had probably found it here and made use of it to fulfil his needs."

"Defying the dictums of the Omnissiah, the heretic had entered into a dangerous field of experimentation with the warp-technology. It is dangerous knowledge... but the ancient and incredibly complex vox-core of the mechanism is much older than Delphim was. He had probably found it here and made use of it to fulfil his needs."

"Defying the dictums of the Omnissiah, the heretic had entered into a dangerous field of experimentation with the warp-technology. It is dangerous knowledge... but the ancient and incredibly complex vox-core of the mechanism is much older than Delphim was. He had probably found it here and made use of it to fulfil his needs."

languages.text: “那个异端分子无视欧姆尼塞亚的禁令，使用亚空间技术进行实验，已然迈进了危险的领域。这类知识十分危险……不过，这台机器的音阵核心异常复杂，而且比德尔菲姆还要古老得多。他可能是先在这里找到了音阵核心，之后再对其加以利用，以满足他的需要。”
languages.original_text: "Defying the dictums of the Omnissiah, the heretic had entered into a dangerous field of experimentation with the warp-technology. It is dangerous knowledge... but the ancient and incredibly complex vox-core of the mechanism is much older than Delphim is. He had probably found it here and made use of it to fulfil his needs."

traits.locale_text: “那个异端分子无视欧姆尼塞亚的禁令，使用亚空间技术进行实验，已然迈进了危险的领域。这类知识十分危险……不过，这台机器的音阵核心异常复杂，而且比德尔菲姆还要古老得多。他可能是先在这里找到了音阵核心，之后再对其加以利用，以满足他的需要。”

languages.text: «Desafiando los dictados del Omnissiah, el hereje se había adentrado en un peligroso campo de experimentación con la tecnología de la disformidad. Es un conocimiento peligroso... pero el antiguo e increíblemente complejo núcleo voco del mecanismo es mucho más antiguo que Delphim. Probablemente lo encontró aquí y lo utilizó para satisfacer sus necesidades».
languages.original_text: "Defying the dictums of the Omnissiah, the heretic had entered into a dangerous field of experimentation with the warp-technology. It is dangerous knowledge... but the ancient and incredibly complex vox-core of the mechanism is much older than Delphim is. He had probably found it here and made use of it to fulfil his needs."

traits.locale_text: «Desafiando los dictados del Omnissiah, el hereje se había adentrado en un peligroso campo de experimentación con la tecnología de la disformidad. Es un conocimiento peligroso... pero el antiguo e increíblemente complejo núcleo voco del mecanismo es mucho más antiguo que Delphim. Probablemente lo encontró aquí y lo utilizó para satisfacer sus necesidades».

languages.text: 「万機神の命令に背き、異端者は<歪み>の技術を使用して危険な実験分野に足を踏み入れました。それは危険な知識です...ただ、古代の信じられないほど複雑な機構のヴォクスコアは、デルフィムよりもはるかに古いです。彼はおそらくここでそれを見つけ、己の欲求を満たすために利用したのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Defying the dictums of the Omnissiah, the heretic had entered into a dangerous field of experimentation with the warp-technology. It is dangerous knowledge... but the ancient and incredibly complex vox-core of the mechanism is much older than Delphim is. He had probably found it here and made use of it to fulfil his needs."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の命令に背き、異端者は<歪み>の技術を使用して危険な実験分野に足を踏み入れました。それは危険な知識です...ただ、古代の信じられないほど複雑な機構のヴォクスコアは、デルフィムよりもはるかに古いです。彼はおそらくここでそれを見つけ、己の欲求を満たすために利用したのでしょう」

languages.text: « Défiant les dictums de l'Omnimessie, l'hérétique s'était aventuré dans un périlleux domaine d'expérimentation des technologies du Warp. Il s'agit là d'un savoir dangereux... mais le cœur-vox antique et incroyablement complexe du mécanisme est de très loin antérieur à Delphim. Il l'a sans doute trouvé ici et s'en est servi pour arriver à ses fins. »
languages.original_text: "Defying the dictums of the Omnissiah, the heretic had entered into a dangerous field of experimentation with the warp-technology. It is dangerous knowledge... but the ancient and incredibly complex vox-core of the mechanism is much older than Delphim is. He had probably found it here and made use of it to fulfil his needs."

traits.locale_text: « Défiant les dictums de l'Omnimessie, l'hérétique s'était aventuré dans un périlleux domaine d'expérimentation des technologies du Warp. Il s'agit là d'un savoir dangereux... mais le cœur-vox antique et incroyablement complexe du mécanisme est de très loin antérieur à Delphim. Il l'a sans doute trouvé ici et s'en est servi pour arriver à ses fins. »

languages.text: "Der Ketzer hatte sich den Dikta des Omnissiah widersetzt und gefährliche Experimente mit der Warp-Technologie durchgeführt. Es ist gefährliches Wissen ... aber der uralte und unglaublich komplexe Vox-Kern des Mechanismus ist sehr viel älter als Delphim. Er hatte ihn vermutlich hier gefunden und für seine Bedürfnisse genutzt."
languages.original_text: "Defying the dictums of the Omnissiah, the heretic had entered into a dangerous field of experimentation with the warp-technology. It is dangerous knowledge... but the ancient and incredibly complex vox-core of the mechanism is much older than Delphim is. He had probably found it here and made use of it to fulfil his needs."

Es ist gefährliches Wissen ... aber der uralte und unglaublich komplexe Vox-Kern des Mechanismus ist sehr viel älter als Delphim. Er hatte ihn vermutlich hier gefunden und für seine Bedürfnisse genutzt.
